actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to impose an excise tax on amounts received in connection with certain acquisitions or combinations of partnerships or real estate investment trusts where dissenting equity holders do not have appraisal rights.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to impose an excise tax on amounts received in connection with certain acquisitions or combinations of partnerships or real estate investment trusts where dissenting equity holders do not have appraisal rights.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to impose an excise tax on amounts received in connection with certain acquisitions or combinations of partnerships or real estate investment trusts where dissenting equity holders do not have appraisal rights.
